name: Chocolate Dip Cookies
description:
Here's our entry for Ludum Dare 48! 

Theme: Deeper and deeper

 Feed the chocolate cookie monster by dipping the cookies deeper and deeper in chocolate to make him happy! 

The soundtrack of the game will go deeper for each turn you win and higher for every turn you miss, be careful!

Programming - Marco Minganna 

Art -Lucia Paganini (lucisaurus) 

Hope you enjoy it!
